conclusion: Velocity after collision is v' = -v_x + v_y = 0, which is incorrect.
Assuming MN is vertical, particle moves downward at 45° to the right.
MN is vertical, particle is injected at 45° to MN with horizontal and vertical components.
45° to MN could mean 45° in the horizontal direction, either to the left or right.
Path from c to f forms a quarter-circle arc given the 45° angle and distances.
